booking.title: Online Booking
booking.description: Allow clients to book appointments 24/7 from their computer or smartphone.

reminders.title: Automated Reminders
reminders.description: Reduce no-shows with automated SMS and email reminders to clients.

profile.title: Online Presence
profile.description: Easily create and customize your business profile to attract new clients.

howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in minutes and transform your business.

step1.title: Create Your Profile

step2.description: Configure your availability and let clients book appointments online.

step3.title: Start Accepting Bookings
step3.description: Share your booking link with clients and start receiving appointments.
